properties.title: Alpenruhe Experience World
properties.abstract: In Saanenland, the Alpenruhe Foundation offers a varied programme for families: the adventure world, with its large play area, petting zoo, adventure garden and café, is the ideal place to enjoy a relaxing and entertaining time in the fresh air.
properties.description:
Children will have a fantastic time in the play area, which has a pirate ship, a jumping pillow, a children’s train and various playhouses. In the water zone, the little ones can build something or go on a treasure hunt.

The petting zoo is the perfect place to observe animals up close and even pet them. The cute dwarf goats, rabbits and other animals eagerly await visitors and provide a popular photo opportunity.

Alpenruhe also has a fragrant and flowering adventure garden: you have the opportunity to enjoy herbs and flowers with all your senses there.

Catering is provided too: you can relax on the covered terrace and have a drink and something to eat in peace at the café. The shop has products from the Alpenruhe Foundation and is also located in the café.
properties.name: Stiftung Alpenruhe
